nodes.text: The Catlia system was a star system that was located within the Chiss Space area of the galaxy's Unknown Regions. It contained the planet Catlia, and was connected by the Phalanx Route hyperlane to the Cormit system. Catlia served as an outlying colony of the sentient Chiss species.
The Catlia system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed it in grid square G-8.
